_comment_name: Full application name displayed in app stores and installation prompts
name: Offline PWA Demo
_comment_short_name: Short name displayed on home screen when space is limited (max 12 chars recommended)
_comment_description: App description for app stores and installation prompts
description: A Progressive Web App demonstrating offline capabilities with service workers
_comment_start_url: URL that loads when app is launched from home screen
_comment_display: How the app should be displayed (standalone = like native app, no browser UI)
_comment_background_color: Background color shown during app launch before content loads
_comment_theme_color: Color of browser UI elements (status bar, etc.) when app is running
_comment_scope: Navigation scope - URLs within this scope are considered part of the app
_comment_lang: Primary language of the app content
_comment_categories: App store categories for better discoverability
_comment_icons: Array of app icons for different platforms and sizes

icons._comment: 96x96 icon for Android home screen (mdpi density)
128x128 icon for Chrome Web Store and Windows
152x152 icon for iOS home screen (iPad retina)
192x192 icon for Android home screen (xxhdpi) and Chrome splash screen
512x512 icon for PWA splash screen and app store listings
32x32 icon for favicon and browser tab (purpose: any = not maskable)

_comment_shortcuts: App shortcuts that appear in context menus (right-click on app icon)
_comment_screenshots: Screenshots for app store listings and installation prompts
_comment_prefer_related_applications: Whether to prefer native apps over PWA (false = prefer PWA)

edge_side_panel._comment: Preferred width when opened in Edge side panel
